ComicInfo.Summary:
The brutality of Rabban and the Harkonnens abounds mid-series, while on Arrakis, Liet and Warrick face a different kind of conflict as they’re pitted against each other in the name of love. Meanwhile Leto and Kailea’s relationship reaches a seemingly unresolvable point, but Leto also finds himself in a fateful meeting elsewhere…
Note: This issue contains a scene involving rape. The scene is adapted from the Dune House Harkonnen novel for the comic series, and while the act itself is not fully depicted or show, it is a scene that some readers may find explicit, unsettling, or disturbing.
